Title: Provides that certain camps may make inquiries of and be provided with information from the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment
Summary: Provides that certain camps may make inquiries of and be provided with information from the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment to determine if any person who may have contact with children is on file on such register.
LawCode: Amd ยง424-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the access of certain information contained in the central register of child abuse and maltreatment
